raw_comment: I noticed that there are more people of color represented than not. I also noticed that the NBA and WNBA have the most amount of people of color in the sport. I wonder what other sports could you have represented in this graph, and why did they choose just these sports? This affects my community by encouraging more kids  to to look up to all of these individuals in these sports and encourage themselves to be like these people. If I were the maker of this graph I would title it, Diversity in Major Sports Leagues.
ace_sentences: I noticed that more people of color are represented than people who are not people of color.
I noticed that the NBA has the most people of color.
I noticed that the WNBA has the most people of color.
I wonder what other sports could be represented in this graph.
I wonder why the maker of this graph chose only these sports.
This graph encourages more kids to look up to these individuals in these sports.
This graph encourages more kids to encourage themselves to be like these individuals.
If I were the maker of this graph then I would title this graph "Diversity in Major Sports Leagues".
